condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1. Number of disaster rescue and evacuation volunteers ready for emergency response 2. Number of disaster resilient shelters constructed 3. Progress made towards Early Recovery agenda among Government of Bangladesh, Non-Government Organizations, and humanitarian practitioners [Scale 0 - 2; 1 for integration of early recovery agenda in the draft national disaster management policy, 2 for integration of early recovery agenda into the final national disaster management policy]
